sentences.en: Abnormally low or high body temperatute effect a variety of physiologic responses including lowered metabolic rate.
sentences.cn: 不正常的低或高体温会影响动物体各种不同的生理应答,包括低代谢率.

sentences.en: An abnormally high electric current may blow out the bulb.
sentences.cn: 过强的电流会使灯炮烧坏的.

sentences.en: An abnormally high level is an indicator that egg quality is low.
sentences.cn: 不同寻常的高水平促卵泡激素表明卵泡质量低.

sentences.en: An abnormally large red blood cell , especially one associated with pernicious anemia.
sentences.cn: 一种贫血症特征是红细胞平均比正常大.

sentences.en: As dilatation occurs, capillaries become abnormally permeable to proteins.
sentences.cn: 随着扩张的发生, 毛细血管对蛋白变得异常地易于渗透.

sentences.en: Blood vessels develop abnormally in cancer tumours.
sentences.cn: 在癌肿瘤中血管出现不正常.

sentences.en: Both were big at birth but were not abnormally large.
sentences.cn: 这两个孩子出生时都比较大，但并非异常的大。

sentences.en: Hypertension ( or high blood pressure ): Condition in which blood pressure is abnormally high.
sentences.cn: 高血压: 血压偏高的病症.

sentences.en: Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy occurs when the heart muscle thickens abnormally.
sentences.cn: 肥厚性心肌病是指心脏肌肉的异常增厚.

sentences.en: Hypertrophy also allows the abnormally high pressure to be developed by a greater number of myofibrils.
sentences.cn: 肥厚也可使大量肌纤维产生异常高的压力.

sentences.en: It can lower abnormally high blood pressure - without the need for any drugs.
sentences.cn: 颈部按摩可以降低不规律高血压的发生 --- 无需任何药物的帮助.

sentences.en: People with the condition have red blood cells smaller than normal — causing a mild form of anaemia — but abnormally high levels of them.
sentences.cn: 患有这种病的人的红细胞比正常人的更小——这导致了一种轻微的贫血——但是红细胞水平异常地高。

sentences.en: She suggests that women are under constant pressure to be abnormally thin.
sentences.cn: 她暗示说女性总是处在保持身材异常瘦削的压力之下。

sentences.en: The test is designed to detect abnormally elevated levels of chromosome 21.
sentences.cn: 该测试用于检查染色体21的不正常升高.

sentences.en: This stops the cells from growing abnormally.
sentences.cn: 这阻止了细胞畸形发育。

sentences.en: This way, if the function or procedure crashes or terminates abnormally, it will not affect any of the other instance processes.
sentences.cn: 这样，如果该函数或过程崩溃或者异常终止，也不会对其他实例进程产生任何影响。

sentences.en: We were just abnormally thin in our own little world.
sentences.cn: 只是我们自己小圈子内的人才会瘦到夸张地步.

words.tran_cn: 反常的，不规则的；变态的
反常地；变态地；不规则地
